text: Stef Caers (born 5 July 1980), also known by his stage names Steffen and later Gustaph (written GVSTÎ›PH) is a Belgian singer and songwriter. He has released multiple songs and has done work as a voice coach and backing vocalist for numerous singers including Eurovision entries Hooverphonic and Sennek. In 2023, Gustaph won Eurosong 2023, a contest to choose Belgium's Eurovision entry. He represented Belgium in the Eurovision Song Contest 2023 with the song "Because of You". He finished in 7th place. == Sources == Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian singers Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants Category:People from Leuven
title: Gustaph
